        public void registerListener(DangerCloseCalculator.ClosestItemListener icl,

        Register listener for updates on closest items to 'hostile' E.g. learn about closets friendly to a given hostile
        Parameters:
        icl - closest item listener for callback
        hostile - the hostile that is used for the closest item.

        Obtain a list of all friendlies in the area that are within the specified range of the target Also track the closest friendly
